entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
